card.name: Argument Ready to Hand
card.text: Spot a Dwarf to choose a Shadow player who must spot a race. Discard from play all minions of all other races.

card.name: Belt of Erebor
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each minion skirmishing bearer loses all damage bonus. Skirmish: Discard this possession to transfer one of bearer's possessions to another eligible bearer.

card.name: A Clamour of Many Voices
card.text: Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish in which you played a {Dwarven} event, you may draw a card.

card.name: Durability
card.text: Make a Dwarf strength +2. Then, if that Dwarf is at a battleground or mountain site, draw a card.

card.name: Dwarven Bracers
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, discard this possession to prevent that wound.

card.name: Dwarven Skill
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Dwarven} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Dwarf strength +3 (or +4 if he has resistance 4 or more).

card.name: Dwarven Warrior
card.text: When you play this companion during the fellowship phase, choose a Shadow player who must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.name: His Father's Charge
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Dwarf strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he is at a mountain or underground site; he has resistance 3 or more; he is bearing a possession; he is skirmishing a fierce minion.

card.name: Loud and Strong
card.text: Skirmish: Discard a {Dwarven} card from hand and spot a minion skirmishing a Dwarf to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: No Pauses, No Spills
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Dwarven} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot 2 Dwarves to draw up to 4 cards.

card.name: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf
card.text: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, make an opponent discard 3 cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.name: ·Proud and Able
card.text: Each Dwarf is damage +1 for each possession he bears. Fellowship: Discard this condition to play a {Dwarven} possession from your discard pile.

card.name: Sharp Defense
card.text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +2 for each possession he bears if he has resistance 4 or more).

card.name: Stalwart Support
card.text: Each Dwarf gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time the fellowship moves from a plains site, discard a card from your hand.

card.name: ·Thrarin, Smith of Erebor
card.text: For each artifact and possession Thrarin bears, he is damage +1.

card.name: Attunement
card.text: Spot an Elf to reveal cards from the top of your draw deck until you reveal a Shadow card. Make an Elf strength +2 for each card revealed. Place the revealed cards in any order on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: ·Elrond, Witness to History
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Skirmish: If Elrond is skirmishing a minion, exert him to place an {Elven} card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: ·Hadafang
card.text: Bearer must be Arwen or Elrond. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may exert him or her to discard a condition from play.

card.name: ·Long-knives of Legolas
card.text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each Orc or Uruk-hai skirmishing Legolas is strength -2.

card.name: ·Orophin, Brother of Haldir
card.text: While Orophin is at a forest site and you can spot another Elf, Orophin is an archer.

card.name: Refuge
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Fellowship: Discard a companion from hand to heal a companion.

card.name: ·Rumil, Brother of Haldir
card.text: Maneuver: Reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is an {Elven} card, Rumil is an archer until the regroup phase.

card.name: Seclusion
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Elven} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an Elf companion to discard a condition from play.

card.name: Taking the High Ground
card.text: Toil 1. (For each {Elven} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Archery: Discard an {Elven} character from hand to make the fellowship archery total +1. Each time the fellowship moves from an underground site, return your Elf to your hand.

card.name: Betrayal of Isengard
card.text: Each time an opponent draws a card (or takes a card into hand) during the Shadow phase, you may remove {1}. Maneuver: Exert Gandalf to wound Saruman twice.

card.name: Discoveries
card.text: Toil 3. (For each {Gandalf} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -3) Spot a {Gandalf} wizard and X other companions to examine the top X cards of your draw deck. Replace those cards in any order.

card.name: ·Gandalf, The White Rider
card.text: Skirmish: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him and another unbound companion skirmishing a minion to make Gandalf strength +3 and have him replace that companion in that skirmish.

card.name: ·Gandalf's Hat
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Each time the fellowship moves from a battleground site, add a burden. Regroup: Add 2 burdens to remove all twilight tokens from the twilight pool.

card.name: Introspection
card.text: Spell. Choose one: Spot a {Gandalf} Wizard to choose an opponent who must discard one of his or her conditions from play; or spot a {Gandalf} Wizard at a battleground site to discard a condition from play.

card.name: ·Jarnsmid, Barding Emissary
card.text: At the start of each skirmish involving Jarnsmid, you may remove a burden (or 2 burdens if you can spot another {Gandalf} companion).

card.name: Mysterious Wizard
card.text: Spell. Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 if you cannot spot 5 burdens).

card.name: Salve
card.text: Spell. To play, spot a {Gandalf} Wizard. Bearer must be a companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound that would kill him or her, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.name: The Terror of His Coming
card.text: Make a {Gandalf} companion strength +2. Then, if that companion is at a battleground or dwelling site, you may take a {Gandalf} condition from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Traveled Leader
card.text: Spot a {Gandalf} Wizard to replace a site in the fellowship's current region with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Watch and Wait
card.text: To play, spot a {Gandalf} companion. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per bearer. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: With Doom We Come
card.text: While Gandalf is at an underground site, he gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) While the fellowship is at a battleground site, each {Gandalf} character gains muster.

card.name: Come Away
card.text: While you can spot Sméagol, the Shadow number of each site is -1. Each time the fellowship moves, wound a companion or discard this condition.

card.name: From Deep in Shadow
card.text: Spot X {Gollum} cards to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. You may play a revealed minion. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Not Alone
card.text: Each time the fellowship moves to a mountain or underground site, you may discard a {Gollum} event from hand to take a minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: There's Another Way
card.text: To play, spot Sméagol. Sméagol is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this condition to replace the fellowship's current site with a site from your adventure deck.

card.name: Treacherous Little Toad
card.text: To play, spot a {Gollum} card. Bearer must be a wounded companion. While you can spot a {Gollum} character or a {Gollum} card in your support area, bearer cannot heal.

card.name: ·Blade of Gondor, Sword of Boromir
card.text: Bearer must be Boromir. He is damage +1. Skirmish: If Boromir is not assigned to a skirmish, discard a {Gondor} card borne by him to have him replace an unbound Hobbit skirmishing a minion.

card.name: ·Boromir, Defender of Minas Tirith
card.text: Ranger. Fellowship: Add {2} to heal Boromir.

card.name: Concealment
card.text: Make a {Gondor} Man strength +1. If he or she is skirmishing a roaming minion, your opponents cannot use special abilities.

card.name: Confronting the Eye
card.text: Fellowship: Spot a {Gondor} Man and add {2} to make each unbound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase (limit +1).

card.name: Elendil's Valor
card.text: Make a {Gondor} companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Faramir, Dunadan of Gondor
card.text: Ranger. Skirmish: Exert Faramir to make him strength +1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer.

card.name: ·Faramir's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be Faramir. He is damage +1. Each minion skirmishing Faramir at a battleground or forest site is roaming.

card.name: Gondorian Steed
card.text: Bearer must be a knight. Bearer is damage +1. Each time the fellowship moves from a mountain site, add {2}.

card.name: Guardian
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Gondor} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Skirmish: If a {Gondor} companion is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him or her replace an unbound companion skirmishing a minion.

card.name: Invigorated
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal a {Gondor} Man (or to heal 2 {Gondor} Men if you can spot a roaming minion).

card.name: Tireless
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Gondor} Man strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is at a battleground site; he or she has resistance 4 or more; he or she is bearing a hand weapon; he or she is skirmishing a roaming minion.

card.name: Valorous Leader
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} companion. Limit 1 per bearer. Skirmish: Discard this condition to discard a possession borne by a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.name: ·Saruman, of Many Colours
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) When you play Saruman, name a culture. Each companion of the named culture is strength -1.

card.name: Brutal Easterling
card.text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish an exhausted companion, it is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Castamir of Umbar, Corsair Vandal
card.text: Fierce. Toil 1. (For each {Men} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Each wounded {Men} minion is strength +2.

card.name: Corrupted Spy
card.text: This minion is strength +1 for each other character you can spot. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less, this minion is damage +1. While you can spot a companion who has resistance 0, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Countless Companies
card.text: Response: If a {Men} possession is discarded from play, stack it here. Shadow: Remove {1} to play a possession stacked here as if from hand.

card.name: Covetous Easterling
card.text: While this minion is skirmishing a Man, it is damage +2.

card.name: Crazed Hillman
card.text: Fierce. While this minion is in a fierce skirmish, it is strength +7 (or +10 if it is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less).

card.name: Crooked Townsman
card.text: This minion is strength +1 for each other character you can spot.

card.name: Dunlending Zealot
card.text: While this minion is exhausted, each unbound companion is resistance -1 (or -2 if the fellowship is at a battleground site).

card.name: Easterling Banner-bearer
card.text: This minion is strength +1 for each wound on each companion he is skirmishing (or +2 for each if that companion has resistance 2 or less).

card.name: Enraged Southron
card.text: Ambush {3}. The move limit for this turn is +1.

card.name: Frenzied Dunlending
card.text: While this minion is bearing a possession, it is fierce.

card.name: Gathering Strength
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Men} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Make a {Men} minion strength +6.

card.name: Goaded to War
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} minion. Each time the fellowship moves to a battleground or plains site, add {1}.

card.name: ·Grima, Betrayer of Rohan
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a {Men} minion, you may exert Grima to exert a companion.

card.name: Harrying Hillman
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving a {Men} minion, add {2}.

card.name: Hemmed In
card.text: While you can spot 6 companions, each companion skirmishing a {Men} minion loses all strength bonuses from possessions. Maneuver: Spot your {Men} minion and discard this condition to transfer a Free Peoples possession borne by a companion to another eligible bearer.

card.name: ·Last Days
card.text: Each time a {Men} minion is killed or discarded from play (except during the regroup phase), you may play a {Men} minion. Its twilight cost is -2, and it is fierce and strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Messenger's Mount
card.text: Bearer must be The Mouth of Sauron. He is fierce. Response: If a {Men} minion is about to take a wound, remove {3} to prevent that.

card.name: ·The Mouth of Sauron, Messenger of Mordor
card.text: Maneuver: Exert The Mouth of Sauron to play a {Men} condition or {Men} possession from your draw deck.

card.name: Mûmak Rider
card.text: Archer. When you play this minion to a battleground or plains site, you may spot another {Men} minion to discard a possession from play.

card.name: Poisonous Words
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Men} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Add {1} for each {Men} card you can spot.

card.name: Trail of Terror
card.text: At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot 3 {Men} minions and remove {1} to make each unbound companion resistance -1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: War Trident
card.text: Bearer must be a {Men} minion. While bearer is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 5 or less, bearer is strength +2. While bearer is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 3 or less, bearer is strength +2.

card.name: Wrathful Hillman
card.text: Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at a plains site, remove {2} or discard this minion.

card.name: ·The Balrog, The Terror of Khazad-dum
card.text: Damage +1. While The Balrog is at an underground site, it is fierce and cannot take wounds or be exerted.

card.name: ·Whip of Many Thongs, Weapon of Flame and Shadow
card.text: Bearer must be The Balrog. It is fierce. When you play this artifact, the Free Peoples player reveals his or her hand and discards all Free Peoples cards from hand that have a twilight cost of 1 or less.

card.name: Abiding Evil
card.text: Spot X burdens to make a character skirmishing an {Orc} Orc strength -X.

card.name: Barrage
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Orc} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Make each of your {Orc} minions strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: The Beckoning Shadow
card.text: To play, exert an {Orc} minion. If you can spot 5 burdens, and the Free Peoples player has no cards in his or her draw deck, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

card.name: Bloodstained Field
card.text: Spot an {Orc} lurker to wound an Elf.

card.name: ·Cave Troll of Moria, Savage Menace
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. Toil 2. (For each {Orc} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Each time an {Orc} lurker wins a skirmish, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.name: ·Cave Troll's Hammer, Unwieldy Cudgel
card.text: Bearer must be an {Orc} Troll. When you play this possession, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion for each lurker you spot.

card.name: Goblin Aggressor
card.text: While this minion is bearing a possession, each {Orc} minion is strength +1.

card.name: Great Cost
card.text: At the start of each skirmish involving an {Orc} minion, you may spot 6 companions to exert a companion in that skirmish. Shadow: Discard this condition and spot an {Orc} minion to make the Free Peoples player place a card from his or her hand on top of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Mordor Aggressor
card.text: While this minion is bearing a possession, each {Orc} minion is strength +2.

card.name: Morgul Tormentor
card.text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.name: Orc Artisan
card.text: Each time you play an {Orc} possession on an {Orc} Orc, you may add {1} (or {2} if that Orc is at a battleground or underground site).

card.name: Orc Dreg
card.text: Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at an underground site, remove {2} or discard this minion.

card.name: Orc Footman
card.text: When this minion is discarded from play, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to shuffle this minion into your draw deck.

card.name: Orc Sapper
card.text: When you play this minion, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to prevent that companion from being assigned to this minion until the regroup phase.

card.name: Orc Skulker
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each skirmish event you play is twilight cost -1.

card.name: Orc Spear
card.text: Bearer must be an {Orc} minion. When you play this possession on a minion that has a twilight cost of 4 or more, add {2}.

card.name: Orc Strategist
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Maneuver: Make an {Orc} lurker minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.name: Orc Tormentor
card.text: Each time the Free Peoples player assigns this minion to skirmish an unwounded companion, he or she must add a burden or discard a card from hand.

card.name: Pitiless Orc
card.text: When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each companion over 4.

card.name: ·Rallying Orc
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Each time you play another {Orc} lurker at a battleground or underground site, you may make the Free Peoples player exert a companion.

card.name: ·Retribution
card.text: Each time an {Orc} minion bearing a weapon wins a skirmish, add a burden. Shadow: Discard this condition to play an {Orc} weapon from your discard pile.

card.name: Scavenging Goblins
card.text: When you play this minion, you may play an {Orc} weapon from your discard pile on your {Orc} Orc.

card.name: Storming the Ramparts
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Orc} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an {Orc} minion to make the Free Peoples player discard one of his or her conditions from play.

card.name: Taunt
card.text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your draw deck (or, if the fellowship is at a battleground site, the top 7 cards) to make an {Orc} minion strength +1 for each {Orc} card revealed.

card.name: ·Troll's Keyward, Keeper of the Beast
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Shadow: Exert Troll's Keyward and reveal your hand to add {1} for each {Orc} Troll revealed.

card.name: Vile Goblin
card.text: Each time this minion is assigned to skirmish a Dwarf, this minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Aldred, Eored Soldier
card.text: At the start of each skirmish involving Aldred, you may discard a possession borne by a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Cast Out
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Rohan} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Maneuver: Spot a {Rohan} Man and discard this condition to exert a minion. Maneuver: Spot a mounted {Rohan} Man and discard this condition to return an exhausted minion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Challenging the Orc-host
card.text: Make a {Rohan} companion strength +2 (or +1 for each minion you can spot if that companion has resistance 5 or more).

card.name: Cleaving a Path
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Rohan} companion strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he or she is at a plains site; he or she has resistance 4 or more; he or she is bearing armor; he or she is skirmishing a wounded minion.

card.name: Coif
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. Each time a Shadow card adds any number of twilight tokens, you may exert bearer to prevent that. Each time the fellowship moves from a forest site, exert a companion.

card.name: ·Éomer, Eored Leader
card.text: While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer's twilight cost is -1. Maneuver: If you can spot more minions than companions, exert Éomer to play a {Rohan} companion from your draw deck.

card.name: Eored Warrior
card.text: While this companion is at a battleground or plains site, he is strength +3.

card.name: For the Mark
card.text: Spot a {Rohan} Man to discard a possession from play. You may exert a {Rohan} Man who has resistance 3 or more to play this event during the maneuver phase.

card.name: Golden Glimmer
card.text: Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot a {Rohan} companion and add 2 burdens to prevent that.

card.name: ·Haethen, Veteran Fighter
card.text: Haethen cannot take wounds during fierce skirmishes. Skirmish: Exert Haethen to make him strength +1.

card.name: ·Leofric, Defender of the Mark
card.text: Skirmish: If Leofric is in a skirmish, exert him to play a {Rohan} skirmish event from your draw deck.

card.name: ·The Mouth of Sauron, Lieutenant of Barad-dur
card.text: Assignment: Assign The Mouth of Sauron to the companion who has the highest strength. (If two or more are tied for highest, choose one.)

card.name: ·Bilbo, Melancholy Hobbit
card.text: Ring-bound. At the start of each skirmish involving Bilbo, you may exert him to take a {Shire} skirmish event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Diversion
card.text: Discard a Hobbit not assigned to a skirmish from play to discard a minion from play. If the fellowship is at a battleground site, you may add 2 burdens to play this event during a skirmish involving a Hobbit.

card.name: Flotsam and Jetsam
card.text: If a companion (except a Hobbit) wins a skirmish, heal a Hobbit.

card.name: Home and Hearth
card.text: Each time you play a Hobbit, you may remove a burden. Then, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site, heal the Ring-bearer.

card.name: Hope is Kindled
card.text: Make a Hobbit strength +2. If that Hobbit wins this skirmish, you may remove a burden.

card.name: Long Live the Halflings
card.text: To play, spot a Hobbit. Skirmish: If your Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to make each companion who has resistance 7 or more strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Measure of Comfort
card.text: While you can spot a Hobbit, each unbound companion is resistance +1.

card.name: No Worse for Wear
card.text: Prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. Then, if the fellowship is at a dwelling site, you may discard 2 cards from hand to return this event to your hand.

card.name: ·Pippin, Hobbit of Some Intelligence
card.text: When you play Pippin, remove a burden or heal a companion.

card.name: A Promise
card.text: While you can spot Frodo and Sam and neither is exhausted, each is strength +1.

card.name: ·Rosie Cotton, Barmaid
card.text: Sam cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns Rosie Cotton to a skirmish, add 2 burdens.

card.name: ·Simple Living
card.text: Response: If you play a {Shire} event, discard this condition to heal each Hobbit.

card.name: Stand Together
card.text: Each time a Hobbit wins a skirmish, he or she gains muster until the end of the turn. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Sudden Fury
card.text: Each time a {Shire} companion loses a skirmish, add a {Shire} token here. Skirmish: Remove a {Shire} token from here to make a {Shire} companion strength +1.

card.name: ·Tolman Cotton, Farmer of Bywater
card.text: Response: If a burden is about to be added by a Shadow card, spot another Hobbit and exert Tolman Cotton to prevent that.

card.name: Advancing Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) When you cannot spot another {Uruk-hai} minion, discard this minion.

card.name: Barbaric Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. Assignment: Make the Free Peoples player assign this minion to an unwounded companion.

card.name: Berserker Torch
card.text: Toil 1. (For each {Uruk-hai} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Bearer must be an {Uruk-hai} Uruk-hai. Bearer is strength +2 for each wound on each character in its skirmish.

card.name: Breeding Pit Conscript
card.text: Damage +1. Muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) When you play this minion, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.

card.name: Broken Heirloom
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Uruk-hai} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot an {Uruk-hai} minion to discard a possession borne by a companion who has resistance 4 or less.

card.name: Broken in Defeat
card.text: Make an {Uruk-hai} minion strength +2. Then you may spot 6 companions to return this event to your hand.

card.name: Crushing Uruk
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Response: If a companion loses a skirmish involving an {Uruk-hai} minion, exert this minion to discard a possession borne by that companion.

card.name: Dark Alliance
card.text: Response: If an ally or companion uses a special ability, discard this condition and exert an {Uruk-hai} lurker to prevent that.

card.name: Merciless Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot a companion who has resistance 4 or less to place this minion on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: Quelling Force
card.text: Make an {Uruk-hai} minion strength +1 for each other {Uruk-hai} minion you can spot.

card.name: ·Saruman, Agent of the Dark Lord
card.text: Lurker. (Skirmishes involving lurker minions must be resolved after any others.) Skirmish: Exert Saruman to make an {Uruk-hai} minion strength +2. Each time a companion is killed, you may heal Saruman.

card.name: Shingle in a Storm
card.text: While you can spot 6 companions, each {Uruk-hai} minion is damage +1. Assignment: Discard this condition to assign an {Uruk-hai} minion to a companion who has resistance 2 or less.

card.name: Strange Device
card.text: Spot an {Uruk-hai} minion to draw 3 cards. Then discard 2 cards from hand or discard an {Uruk-hai} minion from hand.

card.name: ·Suppressing Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. While there is a companion in the dead pile, each unbound companion is resistance -4.

card.name: Tempest of War
card.text: While you can spot an {Uruk-hai} minion, each unbound companion is resistance -1 for each condition he or she bears. Skirmish: Spot an {Uruk-hai} minion and a companion who has resistance 2 or less to discard from play all conditions in all player's support areas.

card.name: Uruk Common
card.text: Damage +1. Each time this minion is assigned to a skirmish, if it is not at a battleground site, remove {2} or discard this minion.

card.name: Uruk Decimator
card.text: While this minion is at a battleground site, it is strength +2. While this minion is bearing a possession, it is damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Desecrator
card.text: Damage +1. Each unbound companion is resistance -2 for each wound he or she has.

card.name: ·Uruk Dominator
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to make it strength +1 for each {Uruk-hai} Uruk-hai you spot (or +2 for each if you can spot a companion who has resistance 3 or less).

card.name: Uruk Pikeman
card.text: Damage +1. While this minion is skirmishing an exhausted companion, this minion is strength +3 (or +5 if that companion has resistance 4 or less).

card.name: Uruk Slaughterer
card.text: Damage +1. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving an {Uruk-hai} minion, you may discard any number of cards from hand to draw the same number of cards.

card.name: ·Uruk Zealot
card.text: Damage +1. To play, spot an {Uruk-hai} minion. Each companion who has resistance 0 is strength -3. Each time Uruk Zealot wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards.

card.name: Uruk-hai Guard
card.text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot a companion to prevent the Free Peoples player from assigning that companion to this minion.

card.name: Uruk-hai Troop
card.text: Damage +1. Each character skirmishing this minion looses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: Vicious Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. At the start of each skirmish involving this minion, you may draw a card for each wound on a character it is skirmishing.

card.name: Weapon of Opportunity
card.text: Bearer must be an {Uruk-hai} minion. When you play this possession on a minion that has twilight cost of 4 or more, draw a card.

card.name: Worthy of Mordor
card.text: At the start of the regroup phase, you may remove {1} to make an {Uruk-hai} minion gain muster until the end of the regroup phase. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: Black Rider
card.text: Fierce. This minion is strength +1 for each companion you can spot.

card.name: Dark Approach
card.text: Play a Nazgûl. His twilight cost is -1 for each forest site you can spot (limit -4).

card.name: Dark Temptation
card.text: Each time you play a Nazgûl, you may heal the Ring-bearer twice to add a burden.

card.name: Echo of Hooves
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Ringwraith} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot your Nazgûl at a battleground or forest site to play a mount on him from your draw deck.

card.name: In the Ringwraith's Wake
card.text: If a Nazgûl wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.name: Lingering Shadow
card.text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgûl. Each time a wound is removed from bearer, add a burden.

card.name: Minas Morgul Answers
card.text: Toil 2. (For each {Ringwraith} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -2) Spot a Nazgûl to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.name: Nazgûl Blade
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. While bearer is at a battleground or forest site, he is strength +1.

card.name: Sauron's Gaze
card.text: Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgûl. The Free Peoples player cannot use bearer's special abilities.

card.name: Sense of Obligation
card.text: To play, spot a {Ringwraith} minion. Bearer must be an unbound companion. Limit 1 per bearer. At the end of each assignment phase, if bearer is not assigned to a skirmish and a companion who does not bear a {Ringwraith} condition is, add a burden.

card.name: Shadowy Mount
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. While bearer is at a battleground or forest site, he is fierce. Assignment: Make the Free Peoples player assign bearer to an unbound companion bearing a {Ringwraith} condition.

card.name: Steed of Mordor
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. Bearer gains muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.) Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may draw 2 cards.

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, Black Predator
card.text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove {2} and discard a {Ringwraith} card from hand to make Úlairë Attëa strength +3.

card.name: ·Úlairë Cantëa, Black Assassin
card.text: Fierce. Assignment: Assign Úlairë Cantëa to a companion who has resistance 0. Skirmish: Spot 6 companions and another {Ringwraith} card to kill a companion Úlairë Cantëa is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Úlairë Enquëa, Black Threat
card.text: Fierce.Toil 1. (For each {Ringwraith} character you exert when playing this, its twilight cost is -1) Response: If you are playing a {Ringwraith} event that has toil X, exert Úlairë Enquëa to reduce that event's twilight cost by X.

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Black Enemy
card.text: When you play Úlairë Lemenya, you may play a {Ringwraith} mount from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Black Hunter
card.text: Fierce. Each time Úlairë Nelya wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nertëa, Black Horseman
card.text: The twilight cost of each mount is -1. While Úlairë Nertëa is mounted, each Nazgûl is strength +1 and has muster. (At the start of the regroup phase, you may discard a card from hand to draw a card.)

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Black Specter
card.text: Shadow: Exert Úlairë Otsëa and discard a {Ringwraith} condition from hand to discard a Free Peoples condition from play.

card.name: ·Úlairë Toldëa, Black Shadow
card.text: Fierce. When you play Úlairë Toldëa, you may exert him to take a {Ringwraith} event from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Unending Life
card.text: While you can spot 6 companions, each Nazgûl is strength +3. Skirmish: Discard this condition to heal a Nazgûl.

card.name: Unimpeded
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a Nazgûl strength +1 for each of the following that is true: he is at a battleground or forest site; he is skirmishing a companion who has resistance 4 or less; he is bearing a possession; he is in a fierce skirmish.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Black Lord
card.text: Fierce. The Witch-King is twilight cost -1 for each wound on the Ring-bearer. Each time a companion is played, you may reveal this card from hand to exert the Ring-bearer.

card.name: ·The Witch-king's Beast, Fell Creature
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. If bearer is The Witch-king, after all skirmishes and fierce skirmishes have been resolved, you may exert him twice to make him participate in one additional assignment and skirmish phase.

card.name: The Angle
card.text: Forest. Shadow: Play a Nazgûl (or spot 6 companions and discard 2 cards from hand) to draw a card.

card.name: The Bridge of Khazad-dum
card.text: Battleground. Underground. The Balrog is twilight cost -3.

card.name: Emyn Muil
card.text: Mountain. Maneuver: Remove 2 and exert your minion that is not fierce to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Hill of Sight
card.text: Battleground. Forest. While you can spot 3 minions (or 6 companions), each unbound companion is resistance -2.

card.name: Hobbiton Market
card.text: Dwelling. When the fellowship moves from this site, wound each minion that is not a lurker.

card.name: Northern Pelennor
card.text: Battleground. Plains. Shadow: Make your lurker minion lose lurker until the regroup phase.

card.name: Shores of Nen Hithoel
card.text: River. Shadow: Spot 5 {Orc} Orcs to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

card.name: Slopes of Orodruin
card.text: Mountain. Shadow: Remove 2 and discard 2 Free Peoples cards from hand to draw a card.

card.name: Starkhorn
card.text: Mountain. Each time your Dwarf wins a skirmish, you may draw a card.

card.name: Wold Battlefield
card.text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your Man (except an enduring Man) to make him or her damage +1.
